ModalNews.Title: Warning!
ModalNews.MarkdownText:
This game is not complete and you may lose information in an update. 

 You can now save your data by logging in with a **Google account**! 

 GmAi is free, but it is very limited in the number of players it can handle per minute. If GmAi doesn't work as expected, try playing at a less busy time. This will require premium accounts, we are looking into the best options. 

 To report an error or give a suggestion, you can write to me at [**alfonso.ar**](https://alfonso.ar). 

 #### **COMING SOON** 

 The following are ideas to improve this app in the future. 

 * Cooperative multiplayer with GmAi. 

 * Character avatar generation with GmAi. 

 * Video generation based on a book with GmAi.

ModalUserConnect.title: Login
ModalUserConnect.p1: When you log in for the first time, whenever you modify your character or book collection, they will be automatically saved to the cloud every few seconds. Changes will be synced across all devices connected to your account.
ModalUserConnect.p2: If you already have an account, when you log in, the local data will be overwritten with the data stored in the cloud.

ModaIdeasForAI.title: Tips and Shortcuts
ModaIdeasForAI.p1: These are tips and shortcuts to help you improve your experience with Game Master AI.
ModaIdeasForAI.p2: * You can only use them within the game.

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1_p_strong: The story ends at 3 failures or 5 successes
tips.tip1_p: If you don't want it to end quickly, you can write your test results or ask GmAi to do them for you. This way they won't be saved in the system and you will prevent the end from being triggered. Although GmAi can conclude on its own, you can ask it to continue as far as you want.
tips.tip2_p_strong: XP earned at the end of the story
tips.tip2_p: Is calculated based on the outcome of your characteristic tests. Only tests launched from your character sheets count, as they are recorded in the system. GmAI keeps its own record, but it's not very reliable.
tips.tip3_p: It's easy, contribute ideas to the plot creatively and not just by choosing the options that GmAi gives you.
tips.tip4_p: It's possible, ask your GmAi to "perform feature tests", that will motivate it to give you more tests and details to move faster in the story. If GmAi makes rolls for you, you can tell it that you want to make all the rolls.
tips.tip5_p_strong: Want to play a campaign of several stories?
tips.tip5_p: Save your story in the library. You can then access it and continue playing from where you left off.
